section.title: Description
section.paragraph: This element contains a brief description of the parent scheme.
This element is optional and may appear only once per scheme.

section.title: Attributes
section.paragraph: There are no attributes for this element.

section.title: Engine Requirements
section.paragraph: This element does not require any special processing.

section.title: Examples
section.example: <description>A scheme that uses blues and greens</description>
